definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
lit. much thunder but little rain; fig. a lot of talk but little action/his bark is worse than his bite

sentences.english: It was raining cats and dogs outside, so we had to stay at home.
sentences.chinese: 外面大雨滂沱，我们只好呆在家里。

sentences.english: The rain fell in torrents, insomuch that the soldiers were often ankle-deep in water.
sentences.chinese: 大雨倾盆，因而士兵们时时需涉水而行。

sentences.english: The pelting rain soaked his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 倾盆大雨淋透了他的衣服。

sentences.english: Festivities were undeterred by the heavy downpour.
sentences.chinese: 欢庆活动在倾盆大雨下如期举行。

sentences.english: 37 heavy rain, no rain, next year.
The old church collapsed after the heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 大雨之后，那座老教堂倒塌了。

sentences.english: A steady rain hampered the progress of the work.
sentences.chinese: 持续不停的大雨妨碍了工程的进展。

sentences.english: Even when it was raining heavily, he refused to carry an umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 即使大雨倾盆，他也总是拒绝带伞。

sentences.english: The rain eventually returns during the party, and everyone except the women run for shelter.
sentences.chinese: 大雨期间，最终的回报党，大家除了妇女跑警报。

sentences.english: The sky rains and lightnings, they are scared and run immediately.
sentences.chinese: 天空立即落起大雨，而且行雷闪电，大伙儿立即。

sentences.english: After a little while, it started to rain heavily.
sentences.chinese: 过了一小会，天就开始下大雨了。

sentences.english: He splashed in the heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 他在大雨下淌着雨水前进。

sentences.english: It was getting darker. The rain was beating on the windows. The wind was rising.
sentences.chinese: 天正慢慢黑下来，大雨拍打着窗子，外面开始起风了。

sentences.english: It was raining heavily. They went on working in the fields, however.
sentences.chinese: 天在下着大雨，然而他们继续在田间劳动。

sentences.english: He led long a my hand to go home in the heavy rain bombing so.
sentences.chinese: 他就这样，在轰隆隆的大雨中，牵着我的手回家了。

sentences.english: Rain opens up and douses the fire.

definition: a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
to take shelter from the rain
